Debdeep Bhattacharya

View the Project on GitHub debdeepbh/debdeepbh.github.io

Determine which physical disk partition mounted on a directory

For example, the / filesystem is installed on

  df /

The directory /root is located in

  df /root

Conversely, to see a list of all block devices and their mount points, use lsblk.

This project is maintained by debdeepbh
